RESOURCE.DESCRIPTION: Helio HEC time based query V1.16.25
RESOURCE.INFO: SELECT yohkoh_hxr_flare.HEC_id,yohkoh_hxr_flare.time_start,yohkoh_hxr_flare.time_peak,yohkoh_hxr_flare.time_end,yohkoh_hxr_flare.nar,yohkoh_hxr_flare.lat_hg,yohkoh_hxr_flare.long_hg,yohkoh_hxr_flare.xray_class,yohkoh_hxr_flare.optical_class,yohkoh_hxr_flare.hxt_lo,yohkoh_hxr_flare.hxt_m1,yohkoh_hxr_flare.hxt_m2,yohkoh_hxr_flare.hxt_hi,yohkoh_hxr_flare.comment,yohkoh_hxr_flare.yoh_event FROM yohkoh_hxr_flare WHERE time_start>='2003-02-01T00:00:00' AND time_start<='2003-02-10T00:00:00' LIMIT 100 OFFSET 0

FIELD.name: xray_class
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Importance of flare at X-ray wavelengths -- the peak flux measured at Earth in the 0.1 to 0.8 nm range in units of Watts/sq meter. (See the 'X-ray Class' in the HEC glossary for the specification of this field)

FIELD.name: optical_class
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Average optical importance of flare -- a measurement of flare size and brilliance. (See the 'Optical Class' in the HEC glossary for the specification of this field)

FIELD.name: hxt_lo
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: L-band (13.9 - 22.7 keV) peak count rate in cts/s/SC (with background of ~ 2 cts/s/SC)

FIELD.name: hxt_m1
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: M1-band (22.7 - 32.7 keV) peak count rate in cts/s/SC (with background of ~ 1 cts/s/SC)

FIELD.name: hxt_m2
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: M2-band (32.7 - 52.7 keV) peak count rate in cts/s/SC (with background of ~ 1 cts/s/SC).

FIELD.name: hxt_hi
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: H-band (52.7 - 92.8 keV) peak count rate in cts/s/SC (with background of ~ 9 cts/s/SC).
